email.title: TheDataOpen - Citadel Virtual Summer Datathon!
email.sponsor:
**Explore. Build. Win.**
The Data Open brings together the best minds in mathematics, engineering, science, and technology to collaborate and compete using the worldâ€™s most important data sets.
[Sign Up Now!](https://www.citadel.com/careers/the-data-open/) Limited spots available!
Starting July 13th, 2020\ This year, we're doing things differently. The Summer Invitational will take place over the course of 1 week with a virtual kick off on July 13th. Teams will collaborate virtually to win $25,000 in cash prizes. Winners will be announced via Zoom at the conclusion of the event.
